participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Energetic and disciplined, Alex enjoys staying fit and is dedicated to her gym routine.
participant_1.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. two dogs live with me.

participant_2.name: Jordan

participant_2.background: i don't care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.
